citation: Proclamation under the Crown Lands (Validation of Fees) Act 2011 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Crown Lands (Validation of Fees) Act 2011

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Crown Lands (Validation of Fees) Act 2011 fix 28 December 2011 as the day on which that Act commences.

19 December 2011

PETER G UNDERWOOD

Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

BRIAN WIGHTMAN

Minister for Environment, Parks and Heritage

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 28 December 2011

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Primary Industries, Parks, Water and Environment.
